de.griefed.versionchecker.gitlab

Class GitLabChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.versionchecker.VersionChecker
      • de.griefed.versionchecker.gitlab.GitLabChecker

  • public class GitLabChecker
extends VersionChecker
    Check a given GitLab repository for updates.
    Versions are checked for semantic-release-formatting. Meaning tags must look like the following examples:
    2.0.0
    2.1.1
    3.0.0-alpha.1
    3.0.0-alpha.13
    1.2.3-beta.1
    and so on.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      GitLabChecker(@NotNull java.lang.String repositoryUrl)
      Constructs a GitLab checker with the given GitLab-URL to allow for version checks as well as version and URL acquisition.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GitLabChecker

        public GitLabChecker(@NotNull
                     @NotNull java.lang.String repositoryUrl)
              throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Constructs a GitLab checker with the given GitLab-URL to allow for version checks as well as version and URL acquisition.
        Parameters:
        repositoryUrl - String. The full /api/v4-GitLab-repository-URL you want to check. Examples:
        https://gitlab.com/api/v4/projects/32677538/releases
        https://git.griefed.de/api/v4/projects/63/releases
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - Thrown if the resulting URL is malformed or otherwise invalid.

      • allVersions

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> allVersions()
        Gather a list of all available versions for the given repository.
        Specified by:
        allVersions in class VersionChecker
        Returns:
        List String. Returns a list of all available versions. If an error occurred, or no versions are available, null is returned.

      • latestVersion

        public java.lang.String latestVersion(boolean checkForPreRelease)
        Get the latest regular release.
        Specified by:
        latestVersion in class VersionChecker
        Parameters:
        checkForPreRelease - Boolean. Whether to include alpha and beta releases for latest release versions.
        Returns:
        String. Returns the latest regular release. If no regular release is available, no_release is returned.
